package.name: Controllers For All.

dependencies.package: mobilesubstrate, ch.ringwald.btstack (>= 0.8-3), preferenceloader, firmware (>= 7.0), com.rpetrich.rocketbootstrap, kr.iolate.simulatetouch

package.shortDescription: Adds game controller support for gaming.

descriptionlist.description: Controllers For All is a tweak that allows you to add iOS compatibility with your game controller. Controllers For All already supports every game that has been updated with iOS controller support, making setup extremely easy, a one-off pair and you're good to go. No other configurations are ever needed again! Controllers For All also turns your phone / tablet into a larger console.
